alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 12:14PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bradford, northern Alachua, Baker, Union, west central Clay, Columbia, northeastern Suwannee, eastern Hamilton, southeastern Echols and southeastern Clinch Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1214 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jasper to near Alachua. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Starke, Jasper, Lake Butler, White Springs, Fargo, Raiford, Worthington Spring, Columbia and Alachua. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua; Western Clay
